Package nl.tudelft.ti1100a.audio

Interface Summary
Rhythm A class implementing Rhythm is something with a rhythm.
RhythmListener A RhythmListener can 'listen' to a Rhythm.
 

Class Summary
AbstractEffectable An abstract implementation of Effectable.
ClickTrack A ClickTrack is a simple implementation of Rhythm to be used with Minim.
LoopMixer A LoopMixer allows you to mix sound loops together easily.
RhythmListenerAdapter An adapter to simplify RhythmListeners that do not need all methods of a RhythmListener.
